entries.meaning: (postpositive, used only with indefinite or interrogative pronouns) Other; in addition to previously mentioned items.
examples: The instructor is busy. Can anyone else help me?

entries.meaning: (usually follows interrogative adverbs) Otherwise, if not.
examples: How else (= in what other way) can it be done?
I'm busy Friday; when else (=  what other time) works for you?
